participant_1.background:
I have a book of nursery rhymes for my infant son.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i teach kindergarten.
i have a job as an it agent.

participant_2.background:
I'm still paying off my student loans, so I don't own a home yet.
I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things.
i want to put my photos to a music video staring adam levin.
My garden is my most prized possession.
My four daughters are my pride and joy.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just got back from teaching kindergarten.
Oh that sounds fun! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love getting to interact with the kids and teach them new things. It's really rewarding.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
I'm sure you do! So, what do you do for fun outside of work?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. I also enjoy reading, writing, and listening to music.
Those sound like great hobbies! What do you like to read?
I love to read all sorts of things, but I'm especially a fan of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! Those are my favorite genres as well.
Oh that's awesome! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
